entry.title: Reflections on a visit to Hohenzollern Castle (游霍亨索伦城堡随想)

link.title: Reflections on a visit to Hohenzollern Castle (游霍亨索伦城堡随想)

entry.summary:
中文版本 (Chinese Version)
Reflections on a visit to Hohenzollern Castle Hohenzollern is the castle I admire the most because it embodies the ideal Germany in my mind: profound, unassuming, yet possessing tremendous strength and ambition, alongside masculine heroism. Perched atop Höhenburg at an elevation of approximately 855 meters, standing here offers a magnificent visual and spiritual delight...
